name: 3dANOVA2
author: AFNI Developers
description: This program performs a two-factor Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) on 3D datasets.

inputs.description: Type of ANOVA model to be used: 1=fixed, 2=random, 3=mixed
inputs.name: ANOVA Model Type

inputs.description: Number of levels of factor A
inputs.name: A Levels

inputs.description: Number of levels of factor B
inputs.name: B Levels

inputs.description: Data set for levels of factor A and factor B
inputs.name: Dataset

inputs.description: Screen output for voxel number
inputs.name: Voxel Number

inputs.description: Print out disk space required for program execution
inputs.name: Disk Space Flag

inputs.description: Use sub-brick #0 of dataset 'mset' to define which voxels to process
inputs.name: Mask Dataset

inputs.description: F-statistic for treatment effect
inputs.name: F-statistic Treatment Prefix

inputs.description: F-statistic for factor A effect
inputs.name: F-statistic A Prefix

inputs.description: F-statistic for factor B effect
inputs.name: F-statistic B Prefix

inputs.description: F-statistic for interaction
inputs.name: F-statistic Interaction Prefix

inputs.description: Estimate mean of factor A level
inputs.name: Estimate Mean A Prefix

inputs.description: Estimate mean of factor B level
inputs.name: Estimate Mean B Prefix

inputs.description: Estimate mean of cell at level i of factor A and level j of factor B
inputs.name: Estimate Mean Cell Prefix

inputs.description: Difference between levels i and j of factor A
inputs.name: Difference A Prefix

inputs.description: Difference between levels i and j of factor B
inputs.name: Difference B Prefix

inputs.description: Difference between cell mean at A=i, B=j and cell mean at A=k, B=l
inputs.name: Difference Cell Mean Prefix

inputs.description: Contrast in factor A levels
inputs.name: Contrast A Prefix

inputs.description: Contrast in factor B levels
inputs.name: Contrast B Prefix

inputs.description: Contrast in cell means
inputs.name: Contrast Cell Means Prefix

inputs.description: Create one AFNI 'bucket' dataset whose sub-bricks are obtained by concatenating the above output files
inputs.name: Bucket Prefix

inputs.description: Request to perform ANOVA using the previous functionality (requires -OK, also)
inputs.name: Old Method Flag

inputs.description: Confirm understanding that contrasts that do not sum to zero have inflated t-stats, and contrasts that do sum to zero assume sphericity (to be used with -old_method)
inputs.name: OK Flag

inputs.description: Assume sphericity (zero-sum contrasts, only). This allows use of the old_method for computing contrasts which sum to zero
inputs.name: Assume Sphericity Flag

output-files.description: F-statistic for treatment effect output file
output-files.name: Output FTR File

output-files.description: F-statistic for factor A effect output file
output-files.name: Output FA File

output-files.description: F-statistic for factor B effect output file
output-files.name: Output FB File

output-files.description: Estimate mean of factor A level output file
output-files.name: Output AMEAN File

output-files.description: Estimate mean of factor B level output file
output-files.name: Output BMEAN File

output-files.description: Estimate mean of cell at level i of factor A and level j of factor B output file
output-files.name: Output XMEAN File

output-files.description: Difference between levels i and j of factor A output file
output-files.name: Output ADIFF File

output-files.description: Difference between levels i and j of factor B output file
output-files.name: Output BDIFF File

output-files.description: Difference between cell mean at A=i, B=j and cell mean at A=k, B=l output file
output-files.name: Output XDIFF File

output-files.description: Contrast in factor A levels output file
output-files.name: Output ACONTR File

output-files.description: Contrast in factor B levels output file
output-files.name: Output BCONTR File

output-files.description: Contrast in cell means output file
output-files.name: Output XCONTR File
